title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposit directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (August 17 - September 13) will also receive:

- The Annis Apocalypse ZR380
- The Arena Workshop
- The Fist Fury Outfit (female only), Love Fist Tee, and Love Fist Flannel
- 50% off an assortment of Arena Modifications
- 2X Arena War Series Rewards
- And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
